detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, V-neck and slits in the sides.
Nightslip in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Nightslip in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Nightslip in soft jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace detail at the back of the neck. Triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust.
Short, fitted dress in velour decorated with plastic beads. Long sleeves, a cut-out section with horizontal straps at the back and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Short jersey dress with a sequined mesh over layer. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long, sequined fringes at the hem.
Moccasins in imitation suede with imitation leather details, and tassels and fringes at the front. Twill linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Moccasins in imitation suede with imitation leather details, and tassels and fringes at the front. Twill linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Deep V-neck, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a deep V-neck that is gathered at the bottom, and draping under the bust. Open back with crossover, twisted straps that create a gentle V-shaped neckline at the back. Lined.
Boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with pile. Lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Rubber soles. Pile lining.
Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Striped trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high waist with pleats at the top, a zip fly, side pockets, one welt back pocket and tapered, ankle-length legs.
Imitation suede boots with a zip up the front and loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Imitation suede boots with a zip up the front and loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Jumper in pattern-knit cotton. Shawl collar with a wrapover front and decorative wooden button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in pattern-knit cotton. Shawl collar with a wrapover front and decorative wooden button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small frilled collar and concealed buttons with a frilled button band down the front. Frilled yoke at the back, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist with a press-stud, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable elastic braces.

Short blouse in patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck, seam under the bust and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and ties at the hem.
Bell-shaped skirt in imitation leather with a visible zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Body in jersey crêpe and microfibre with short sleeves and an open back with a knot detail. Laser-cut edges at the bottom and press-studs at the crotch.
Body in jersey crêpe and microfibre with short sleeves and an open back with a knot detail. Laser-cut edges at the bottom and press-studs at the crotch.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted polo-neck jumper in fine-knit wool with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
